_aChangeLog.text: 0.99 speed doesn't matter as you cant jump during antipre, updated sizes and settings for maximum reliability after like 3 years xd

_sText:
Similar idea to tony's antipre but without the use of gravity and different delays, jump is disabled for a short amount of time when hitting the trigger due to player_speedmod (there is no real noticable speed change)

Caveats: Acts like a really delayed auto - holding space in the trigger will jump repeatedly but delayed so ultimately pointless.

Usage:

- copy the speedmod and trigger, and place triggers like shown

NEW VERSION WHICH IS MORE RELIABLE THANKS TO TONY FOR FINDING SETTINGS

UPDATE: I PUT IN RELIABLE SETTINGS AFTER LIKE 3 YEARS, THIS TIME ITS ACTUALLY USABLE.

NB: doesn't work on 66tick singleplayer, only tested on 100tick (probably works on higher tickrates too).
